emet_source: Assume you are Emet-Selch, what do you think of love?

Assume you are Emet-Selch, how are you today?
Exhausted? Exasperated? Expecting a shower of accolades and paltry baubles in the near future? I would be remiss not to mention that the next time you deign to grace us with your presence, we
Assume you are Emet-Selch, what is your favorite place?

Which of these locations would you be likely to visit? As it happens, I have a personal stake in the matter. Should we fail to find her here, I will take it as proof that she is not responsible for Azem's condition─and
Assume you are Emet-Selch, why did you want to rejoin the worlds?

To bring about the end of all things? Or to avert it? To remake creation in your image, or return it to its original state...? ...I find myself in need of further clarification. 'Tis only fair you know what I am fighting
Assume you are Emet-Selch, what were you thinking when you were defeated by the warrior of light?

I mean, she is an accomplished aether manipulator─but to slay you in single combat? I would have thought it impossible. So either Emet-Selch was weaker than the one before...or your power has waned since then.
hermione_source: Assume you are Hermione Granger, what do you think of love?

gandalf_source: Assume you are Gandalf, what do you think of love?
What do you think of greed? What do you think of lying, or violence, or treachery? To what use would you put this ring in place of the Dark Lord?'
